articles.title: The Epistemic Limitations of AI-Generated Text: A Collage of Language Without Truth
articles.author: Mike Zimmer
articles.summary: ChatGPT is an AI-generated text model that produces fluent, structured text without reasoning, verification, or understanding. It operates through probabilistic word prediction, drawing on an untraceable mix of correct, incorrect, curated, and uncurated information. ChatGPT does not differentiate between truth and falsehood, treats all text as a linguistic structure to be recombined based on probability, not epistemic validity.
